Create pseudo bulk from single cell object

Source: R/cell_deconvolution.R
create_sc_pseudobulk.Rd

Create pseudo bulk from single cell object

Usage

create_sc_pseudobulk(
  sc_obj,
  cells_labels,
  sample_labels,
  normalized = TRUE,
  file_name
)

Arguments

sc_obj

A Seurat single cell object

cells_labels

A character vector with the cell labels (need to be of the same order as in the sc_obj)

sample_labels

A character vector with the samples labels (need to be of the same order as in the sc_obj)

normalized

Whether pseudobulk should be or not TPM normalized

file_name

A string specifying the name of the .csv pseudobulk saved in Results/

Value

A gene count matrix (genes as rows and samples as columns)
